DOC.brief_summary: The present study aim investigate effect exercise program health-quality life ( HQL ) old adult .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Exercise Program Health-quality Life ( HQL ) Older Adults
DOC.detailed_description: The questionnaire consist demographic data ( age , gender , educational level , employment ) LEIPAD questionnaire use measure HQL .
DOC.criteria: sixty healthy adult volunteer age 55 year neurological disorder acute heart impairment unstable chronic illness severe musculoskeletal impairment
